  index: "my-index-000001",
  mappings: {
    dynamic_templates: [
      {
        named_analyzers: {
          match_mapping_type: "string",
          match: "*",
          mapping: {
            type: "text",
            analyzer: "{name}",
          },
        },
      },
      {
        no_doc_values: {
          match_mapping_type: "*",
          mapping: {
            type: "{dynamic_type}",
            doc_values: false,
          },
        },
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response);
